#summary Download instructions and files.

[http://code.google.com/p/sfepy/downloads/list (All downloads)]

*Installation instructions:*

  http://docs.sfepy.org/doc/introduction.html#installation

  related: compiled UMFPACK library for python on windows: http://code.google.com/p/umfpackpy/


*Latest released sources:*

  http://sfepy.googlecode.com/files/sfepy-2011.2.tar.gz

*Git repository:*

  * download the repository (read-only):
   {{{
   git clone git://github.com/sfepy/sfepy.git
   }}}

  * download the repository (read-write, permission needed):
   {{{
   git clone git@github.com:sfepy/sfepy.git
   }}}

  * web access :

    http://github.com/sfepy/sfepy

  * latest snapshot:

    http://github.com/sfepy/sfepy/archives/master

*Git playground:*

  * some experimental branches http://github.com/rc/sfepy/tree/master
    * clone the repository:
    {{{
    git clone git://github.com/rc/sfepy.git
    }}}

*Experimental femhub installation:*

  !SfePy can now be used within [http://code.google.com/p/femhub/ femhub], see the [http://code.google.com/p/femhub/wiki/ExampleSfePy example]. It is not fully capable yet, but installing femhub is probably the easiest way to try !SfePy, as all the dependencies are handled automatically.
